name: AWS CloudFormation
short: A service that allows you to use infrastructure as code to provision and manage AWS resources.
description: AWS CloudFormation is a service that helps you model and set up your Amazon Web Services resources so you can spend less time managing those resources and more time focusing on your applications. It uses templates written in JSON or YAML format for resource provisioning. With rollback and versioning features, it enables safe and efficient infrastructure management. It supports a wide range of AWS services, making it a versatile tool in automating and simplifying AWS resource management.
